(First you say it's not in your chest, then it is.  Man, you're crazy)


Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector:




Vehement would've laughed at Iron Raptor's display of ignorance, but Vehement 
wasn't in control of his own body.

"Foolish Maximal." an arm raised, but Unicron seemed to notice all the 
Maximals, but a plan formed without a tiny bit of fear.

---

Sun Crusher saw an object approaching, and raised his right wrist, the barrel 
attached to the bottom of it, two missiles launching out at Whistler's 
sternum as he jumped at him.

The Brotherhood member transformed to his hover tank mode.
---

Reflector flew upward, the missiles missing but twenty of the bullets 
striking his legs and the flames engulfing the back of them.

He didn't seem to notice the damaged armor of his legs, transformin to his 
camera mode and hovering the air.  A bright flash emitted from the camera, 
the flash designed to temporarily disable optic sensors, the flash heading 
for the Maximals present.

---

Vehement's face contorted into a smile, the robot doing a flip backwards and 
transforming into the shape of a sword.  The sword hovered for the briefest 
of seconds, not affected by the flash, same as Sun Crusher.  The tip of the 
nine foot long broadsword began to glow a dark emerald.

A bolt lanced out form the tip of the blade, extending into a fifty by fifty 
radius, the middle of the blast pointed at Iron Raptor.

Control returned to Vehement, who instantly felt more drained then he ever 
had, scanners telling him he had lost 80% of all his power in that single ye 
powerful blast.  He transformed back to robot mode, feeling but not showing 
his weakness.
